duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate various pieces of heavy equipment, with a focus on front-end loaders, and manage incoming aggregate materials.
Perform daily pre-start up procedures, routine maintenance, and cleaning of heavy equipment.
Communicate job specifications, daily operations, and operate equipment in a safe and responsible manner.
Follow safety procedures, report to assigned job area in proper attire, and adhere to safety guidelines.
Assist with plant repairs, breakdowns, and perform other duties as assigned by the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school education or GED equivalent
Minimum six months related experience/training or equivalent combination of education or experience
